problem.markdown:
Classify the statement below as A, E, I, or O.
>>No fizznits are spambots.<<
( ) A (Universal Affirmative)
(x) E (Universal Negative)
( ) I (Particular Affirmative)
( ) O (Particular Negative)

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Classify the statement below as A, E, I, or O.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: No fizznits are spambots.
